title: Copyright and Photography Credits
publication_title: The Lithographs of James McNeill Whistler: The Digital Edition
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body">Support for this publication was provided by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation. Additional assistance was provided by the Print and Drawing Club of The Art Institute of Chicago and the International Fine Print Dearlers Association, Inc.  
Copyright 1998 by The Art Institute of Chicago in association with The Arie and Ida Crown Memorial  
All rights reserved. No part of this publication may be reproduced in any manner whatsoever without prior permission in writing from the Publications Department, The Art Institute of Chicago, 111 South Michigan Avenue, Chicago, Illinois, 60603.  
Executive Director of Publications: Susan F. Rossen  
Associate Director of Publications: Robert V. Sharp  
Editors: Britt Salvesen and Elisabeth Dunn  
Production Manager: Daniel Frank, assisted by Sarah Guernsey

Designed by studio blue, Chicago.  
Typeset by Paul Baker Typography, Inc., Chicago  
Digital photography and halftone separations by Martin Senn, Philomont, Virginia  
Additional photography by the Department of Imaging, the Art Institute of Chicago, Alan Newman, Executive Director  
Printed by Meridian Printing, East Greenwich, Rhode Island  
Bound by Acme Binding, Charleston, Massachusetts  

Library of Congress Cataloging-in-Publication Data  
Whistler, James McNeill, 1834–1903.  
The lithographs of James McNeill Whistler / Harriet K. Stratis and Martha Tedeschi, general editors.  
p. cm.

Includes bibliographical references and index.  
Contents: V. 1. A catalogue raisonné / catalogue entries by Nesta R. Spink, Harriet K. Stratis, and Martha Tedeschi, with the assistance of Britt Salvesen; essays by Katharine A. Lochnan—V. 2. Correspondence and technical studies. Whistler-Way correspondence / edited by Nicholas Smale; essays by Nicholas Smale; contributions by Kevin Sharp. Whistler’s papers: compilation of watermarks / by Harriet K. Stratis.  
ISBN 0-86559-150-4 (V. 1)  
1\. Whistler, James McNeill, 1834–1903—Catalogs. I. Stratis, Harriet K. II. Tedeschi, Martha. III. Spink, Nesta R. IV. Lochnan, Katharine Jordan. V. Smale, Nicholas. VI. Way, Thomas R. (Thomas Roert). VII. Title.  
NE2312.W45A4 1998  
769.92—DC21  
97-15806  
CIP

Distributed by Hudson Hills Press, Inc., 122 East 25<sup>th</sup> Street, Fifth Floor, New York, NY 10010-2936  
Editor and Publisher: Paul Anbinder  
Distributed in the United States, its territories and possessions, and Canada through National Book Network. Distributed in the United Kingdom, Eire, and Europe through Art Books International Ltd. Exclusive representationin China by Cassidy and Associates, Inc.  
COVER: detail of Nocturne (cat. 8)

FRONTISPIECE: The Little Nude Model, Reading (cat. 33)

Second edition

The OSCI Toolkit is an open-source digital authoring and publishing platform. Find the Art Institute’s toolkit customizations and additions on github under the OSCI-Toolkit, OSCI-Toolkit-Frontend, and ChicagoCodeX repositories.
